t = int(input())
for tc in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = l[0]
    sum = l[0]
    for j in range(1, n):
        if l[j] > m:
            sum += l[j] - m
        m = l[j]
    print(sum)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    sum_a = a[0]
    max_a = a[0]
    for j in range(1, n):
        if a[j] > max_a:
            sum_a += a[j] - max_a
        max_a = a[j]
    print(sum_a)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = m[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        ans += max([m[i] - m[i - 1], 0])
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    lis = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = 0
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if i == 0:
            s += lis[i]
            ans += lis[i]
        elif lis[i] < s:
            x = s - lis[i]
            s = s - x
        elif lis[i] > s:
            x = lis[i] - s
            ans += x
            s = s + x
    print(ans)

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    li = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    x = 0
    alloc = 0
    p = 0
    for i in li:
        p = i - x
        if p > 0:
            alloc += p
        x = i
    print(alloc)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    S = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = [0] + S
    final = []
    for i in range(len(s) - 1):
        a = s[i + 1] - s[i]
        if a > 0:
            final.append(a)
    print(sum(final))

    s = [0] + S

        if a > 0:
            final.append(a)
    print(sum(final))

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    x = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    current = 0
    sum = 0
    for i in range(len(l)):
        if i == 0:
            current = l[0]
            sum = l[0]
        elif l[i] > current:
            sum += l[i] - current
            current = l[i]
        else:
            current = l[i]
    print(sum)
    t -= 1
